reviewtext: snapshooter convenience, professional level images. easy to use in default, amazingly flexible(complicated) when you delve into features. lens seems a little fragile when extended, but linked optical/digital zoom with  one button improves greatly on c-2020, which i also have. this is my 5th  digital, and i love it. with large-gig laptop, and pcmcia card adapter,  it's easier than floppies.
